website_summaries.verdict: Low-carb recipes that are so delicious you won't even notice they are grain- and gluten-free.
pros: Includes 154 grain-free, gluten-free, and low-carb recipes
Has a strong, positive message about eating healthy foods that also make you happy
Outlines pantry essentials to help you get started
Instructions are detailed and easy to follow
cons: Majority of the recipes include dairy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality made but recipes are really good
customer_reviews.text: I really love the recipes in this book and we used many recipes so far. This book is just what I wanted to live a healthier lifestyle. However, I'm giving it only 3 stars because the quality of the book is awful. The binding started coming apart after only 1 week. Since its a cook book that has the potential to be used a lot, you would think they would spend a little bit more on the binding. Otherwise, the recipes are delicious, not overwhelmingly seasoned or complicated. Wish I could give it 5 stars but Im disappointed with the cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: MAS2012

customer_reviews.title: Almost helpful, but not
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was truly what the title touted and was a low carb/gluten free book. It is gluten free but no help for low carb. No carb count or calories on ANY recipie. Gluten free IS NOT LOW CARB. Some of us need both and this book was woefully disappointing and for $23.00 it also arrived with 30 pages bent badly. Do NOT buy this is you are low carb AND gluten free.....way too many carbs. sigh
customer_reviews.author: S. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Pages fall out of book
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are good, but beware that the physical quality of the book is pretty bad. The binding is terrible and the pages are all letting loose. I'm trying to be as careful as possible, but the pages are falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Earthbird

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't made a ton of Gluten free meals, but based on other reviews of this book I thought I'd give it a try. I followed the directors of 3 meals and they all were gross! I don't recommend wasting your money on this book.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not Dairy-Free!
customer_reviews.text: So many recipes have heavy cream and/or cheese. Also almond flour/coconut flour. I guess I need a gluten free, grain free, dairy free, but free cookbook. That said many of the recipes in this book are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Binding Falling Apart!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes this cook book fell apart after the first few uses. Recipes are excellent but the binding keeps breaking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the book this morning - made the Orange Ginger Pork Chops with the Brussel Sprouts Salad for dinner tonight. Absolutely delicious. Can't wait to try more! BTW I do love cooking and don't have a problem finding recipes for NSNG but this book just reduces all that hunting for what you want. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lizsabb

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new, heavy dairy
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are easy enough, but I would say 75% of them contain a hefty amount of dairy. I know ways to adapt to make them dairy-free, but I thought the whole point of this book was to eat healthier. Heavy cream and lots of cheese are not ideal ingredients for that. I can just make my regular recipes and sub with almond flour instead of buying this book. I gave two stars because the pictures are pretty and there are quite a few of them. Also, she addresses the dairy in her “My Story” section and how her next cookbook will be dairy-free. Good to know AFTER I’ve already purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this book at all and ended up sending it back. It is not a beautiful book imo, it appears rather carelessly designed, the photos are not appealing, and the recipes themselves weren't appealing either. Definitely did not seem worth the $26 price tag
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Ear happy and blind
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one bit happy that there is no nutrition information listed for recipes. I’m suppose to trust you it is low carb? I’m returning the book.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Parsk

customer_reviews.title: no nutritional info
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, the recipes look good. However, if someone is following a strict low carb/keto diet, tracking your carbs at the very least is important. I was very disappointed this was not provided. Yes, I know I can enter the recipe into the appropriate app and come up with it myself, but if I buy a book that touts low carb recipes, I expect that info to be there.
customer_reviews.author: debg

customer_reviews.title: This is an EPIC Healthy Lifestyle Book not a Diet Book
customer_reviews.text: We love our #EatHappy cookbook!!! Anna Vocino is a passionate cook who has created some amazingly clean and healthy recipes to live by. This is not a diet book. Diet is a bad 4 letter word as it symbolizes a short term mindset. She's created an EPIC Lifestyle book for a long term mindset. We've barely tapped into the massive amounts of recipes in here. This book will truly help you rebuild a healthy lifestyle while helping new cooks or experienced cooks learn to prepare healthier recipes that are #glutenfree #grainfree and #lowcarb so we call can live a more joyful life!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mulvaney

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I used this book at least once a week! I do the anti infkamatory diet so substitute some ingrediants but it's my fav go to cookbook! Everything is soooo gooood in it. I've never had a cookbook that had such good food. I mean wow. And the dishes would seem complex but they rnt. They r easy peasy and everyone I cook for from it loves it and calls me a chef. But I'm not. I hate cooking but this makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: aboveparr

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this cookbook given the stellar reviews. While the recipes sound ok, I wasn't inspired by anything. The photography is terrible and there isn't much of it. This just looks like a low budget publication. With all the gorgeous cookbooks on the market, I'm positive there is another one that provides gluten and grain free recipes in a more inspiring format. Pass on this one, I'm sending it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pocket

customer_reviews.title: and I am thrilled to report that it is even more excellent than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for this cookbook from the moment Anna first mentioned the idea, and I am thrilled to report that it is even more excellent than I had hoped. The recipes actually break new ground...not just the same ol'. The photographs are amazing. I have the largest private pain clinic in the state of Nebraska (granted, that's like saying I have the largest cattle herd in Manhattan), but still, it's quit a few folks. Misdiagnosed food allergies constitute a sizable proportion of patients with vague abdominal complaints. I have several that I have diagnosed with celiac disease and I have had them waiting for this book to drop. It should be on everyone's kitchen bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hubbell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy food!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book, bought it on kindle...loved the recipies. I've lost 50 lbs in 4 months loving every meal. Gave out copies of the book for Christmas and now just bought a hard copy for myself. Just buy it now you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Poorly organized! Amazing recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing recipes. Poor organization. This book has simple recipes that are tasty. But if want to locate anything in the book good luck. Book mark the recipes after you make them. My favorite recipe is the Pulled pork BBQ Pg 108!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Simple recipes with big flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I am a cookbook collector and have become quite persnickety about how recipes are written in addition to how the food tastes. This book is written very clearly and as importanty, for a book of this genre, it has completely accessible ingredients that dont break the bank. I have made about a dozen recipes and all were great! That is saying a lot!! Most books have 2-3 keepers and many that just have such far out ingredients that it isnt worth it. Get this book if you are doing LCHF! You cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a little disappointed with the recipes in this book. I'm not a picky eater and eat gluten free and paleo often but there's a lot in this book I wouldn't eat. This is strictly personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymousreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, Easy-to-Follow Recipes! Beautiful Color Photos, too!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this book requires ingredients (i.e., spices) that most of us probably have in our cabinets. Also, the recipes are very easy to follow, and yet are so creative! Beautiful color photos, too! I also really like that most of the recipes do not call for cheese as a required ingredient. I have a loved one who is allergic and who is also low-carb, so I’ve had a lot of trouble finding a variety of delicious recipes. This cookbook is perfect for me, and I expect will be one of my favorite go-to’s! I’m very happy with this purchase, and I hope if you buy it, you feel the same!
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! It's the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book!! I've never been much of a cook until this book. Every recipe works and is sooooo delicious!!! Even the kids like the food, and that's saying a lot. Anna Vocino has clearly perfected the items in this book and her commentary is so personable. She makes me feel like a chef. I enjoy cooking for the first time. It's so rewarding to make grain free/sugar free food that's sooooo good!! The food is so good, youre not at all wishing for the grains or sugar. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!!! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this cookbook!! Not only are these recipes easy, but oh so tasty...my favorite so far is the chicken with artichoke, spinach, and tomatoes. The flavor is out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: Yelwor

customer_reviews.title: Love the recipes, beware of the book binding!
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of the recipes but the book is coming apart. The pages are simply disengaging from the binding and I'm not rough with my cookbooks. This is quite annoying, to say the least, because I do like this cookbook! I would give it a 5 star rating if it weren't for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: No information on Calories or Carbs- returning!
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok but the whole reason I bought a low carb receipe book is to follow it so that I know how many carbs are in the receipe- NO WHERE does this book list them. I’m not just assuming I’m fine, I count and calculate every meal so I stay on track. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: PHAC

customer_reviews.title: I have been on this plan for a month.
customer_reviews.text: Love the recipes and sharing with friends. My favorite so far: Zucchini Pasta Bolognese, Bacon Wrapped Dates, Cheesy Biscuits, Pittsburgh Turkey Chili, Roasted Lentil & Cauliflower Soup, Herb Roasted Lamb Chops, Coconut Crusted Shrimp, Pan Fired Bone-In Rib Eye, Lemon Oregano Zucchini Pasta w/ Cauliflower, Rosemary Sweet Potato Hash, Rise & Shine Scrample & Mexican Chocolate Pots. There was only 1 recipe so far that I didn't like. The food is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: TaRa

customer_reviews.title: Great Book.  Realistic Recipes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying to find a low carb pancake recipe, with no luck. I finally got Anna's book and decided to try her recipe. Now, I do not have any fresh berries, nor do I have walnuts. Instead, I added chopped pecans. I added a dash of cinnamon to the recipe as well. I topped it with heavy whipping cream, cinnamon & swerve. I've enjoyed all the recipes I've tried so far. I recommend this book to everyone trying to find realistic recipes for a low carb lifestyle. Anna, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: MamaRN

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Cookbook Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this cookbook! Anna Vocino cooks how I like to cook. I don't like fad diets and I really don't like fake sugars. I am so happy to have a cookbook that shares my views. This is by far my favorite cookbook I've ever owned. I cook all of my food from scratch and avoid all processed foods to the best of my ability. I already have made a few of her recipes and they all have been great. I love all the pictures and how simple the recipes are written. I'll be counting down till her second book. Get to work Anna....lol!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Delicious food, beautiful pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by the flavors every recipe packs! I’ve now made at least 6 dishes and they’ve all been delicious and easy to follow! I’m an accomplished cook, not a chef just a mom who’s cooked for many years, and I’m thrilled with this cookbook. Long ago I learned to make a recipe exactly as is and then change items to your liking the second time you cook it. You can’t judge a recipe otherwise. Well, I would change nothing in the recipes I’ve tried! The food is delicious and the pictures are gorgeous. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook in my collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks ago and I’m already down a few lbs. I haven’t had any carbs in about 3 weeks and I have so much fat in my diet, no carb or sugar cravings at all!!! Can’t wait for Eat Happy 2!!!! Every recipe I’ve made is amazing. The flax pancake is my fave, as is the roasted chicken which last me almost 5 days. A MUST buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Recipe Reference for Low Carb meals
customer_reviews.text: I recently became a convert to the No Sugar No Grains way of eating. I struggled for years with calorie counting and getting nowhere and I have seen much success with NSNG. One of the harder parts of the low carb restrictions is finding interesting meals other than steak, bacon and green veggies. Anna's book helps fill that void. There are so many interesting keto and low carb delicious recipes to choose from and I have tried many, all winners and will work my way through the entire volume.
customer_reviews.author: David Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookbook #NSNG
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this cookbook, the recipe are easy, and don't have long lists of ingredients. Oddly though, my copy doesn't have an index, and the chapter opener list doesn't have page numbers so it's a little difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: KAinSC

customer_reviews.title: Best Low Carb Gluten Free Grain Free Cookbook EVAH!
customer_reviews.text: Anna has worked her petute off to create a book chock full of recipes that are yeah, super healthy, but also ALL freaking delicious! I have been making the dishes for my family and they are so busy inhaling them they don't even notice there's no grain or sugar. (Bwahaha...) Even my Williams Sonoma cookbook snob husband was forced to admit the recipes were awesome. My iPad has been relocated to the kitchen permanently because I need my Eat Happy at my fingertips at all times. Not into Gluten free, Grain Free or Low Carb? Buy Eat Happy anyway. Simply some of the best, most interesting, and high "make-able" recipes out there today. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Bouchez

customer_reviews.title: Book is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are great, but the book is falling apart after only a couple months. Pages are coming out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-have Kitchen Staple!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily my favorite cookbook! I've made several recipes so far and they always end up being tastier than I think they will be. If you are Celiac or going gluten and/or grain-free -- or if you're just looking to transition into a better way of eating (no to low sugar, no grains) let this be your guide. My husband who isn’t into this way of eating loves these meals. Tori’s “fried chicken” is THE BEST! At the top of my list so far are the fathead pizza, abodingas soup, and the pita chips. Recipes are easy to follow -- you can't screw them up. I've tried. Would make an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Katie

customer_reviews.title: Omg I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love it!! I love how Anna tells her story and the reason for no sugars and grains in the beginning of the book. I love how before each recipe she writes something about the food or occasion. I love how it feels like she is actually talking to the reader instead of writing a book!! I really can't even put into words how much I love this cookbook, which is so much more than just a cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: wmohr74

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful cookbook...actually, calling this beauty a cookbook does it a disservice. The recipes are easy and have a lot of variety for all tastes. The photos are gorgeous and the quality of the book actually makes this appropriate for display or "coffee table". The beginning gives a "Pantry & Fridge Essentials" list, and each chapter is summarized with a title page containing a recipe list. Chapter 5 lists "Sauces, Marinades, Dressings, and Make Your Own" which is invaluable. Very happy with my purchase and can't wait to try all the recipes. Thank you, Anna. ♡
customer_reviews.author: Luv-2-Read

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful Real Food
customer_reviews.text: These recipes are the most flavorful food I've ever had. I only cook a couple times a year, so I have no real cooking skills. Every dish I've made from Eat Happy was amazing! Even my kids like my cooking now. The steps are easy to follow, and the ingredience are easy to find. I started eating no sugar, no grain #nsng this year. I will never go back to processed food. This food is so delicious amazing and flavorful! Seriously, so much flavor!!! Thank you Anna Vocino for all the time and effort you put into these recipes to make them not only easy, but delicious. Gotta go cook! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: oh so happy
customer_reviews.text: We have all been waiting for this book since Anna first mentioned it on the podcast !!! Its finally here. I feel like I want to do a Steve Martin in The Jerk......"the new cook book is here, the new cookbook is here !!!! " Made the first recipe out of this over the weekend...Simple Beef & Portobello Stew....Best stew I have ever had, much less made myself. (sorry Mom)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee Buxbaum

customer_reviews.title: The best cookbook you could ever hope for.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking forward to this cookbook for a couple of years. Got the pdf and It's so damn good, I pre ordered the hardcover as well. All the recipes are simple, yet absolutely delicious, and no one ever leaves my table hungry. Her recipes make nsng easy to stick to, and cooking very enjoyable. The photos in the book are very beautiful and well done!
customer_reviews.author: FknBrian1919

customer_reviews.title: Delicious recipes for happy eating!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, diverse collection of recipes perfect for paleo, low carb, or grain-free diets. Some recipes are simple and some are more complex, so it is good for all levels of experience in the kitchen. The pictures are mouth-watering, but be sure to try the recipes without pictures too! The Cheese Biscuits are a favorite in my house, and the Asparagus, Onion, and Mushroom Cream Soup is divine. I’ve cooked probably half the book since I bought it. I keep it on my kitchen counter so it’s always handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jerms

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book was recommended to me. I've tried some of the recipes, and they're great. The good thing is, these are healthy, tasty recipes that naturally get us eating lots more vegetables. And most of the ingredients are things we already have around the house. I like easy recipes that take a short time to prepare too. And these are very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: "Low-Carb is boring".....NOT!
customer_reviews.text: My wonderful fiance was convinced that eating low carb would be boring...boy did I prove him wrong. Anna's book has been a fantastic addition to our kitchen. We have loved each dish that we've made so far. Our favorites would have to be the Pittsburgh chili and the chicken with cherry tomatoes, artichokes and spinach. The instructions are clear and I like Anna's humor throughout the recipes. Very happy with this cook book and can't wait for the next one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: BEST No Sugar No Grain cookbook ever written
customer_reviews.text: I have several Paleo, Primal and Gluten Free cookbooks. This by far is my favorite, with NomNom Paleo being my second favorite. I've made several recipes in this book, the Pita Chips, the Pittsburg Turkey Chili, the Bolognese with zoodles, Mexican casserole, meat pie with cauli on top. Oh my gosh, all good. Everyone in the house loves this stuff, and I'm the only true NSNG'er. It's nice to only have to cook one meal. If you like to cook, and doubly, like to eat, all while getting healthier, this is the book to get. I've managed to keep diabetes at bay, which is more challenging as one gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great book. Awesome food!
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying the low carb,grain free, gluten free eating, this is the only cookbook you will ever need. Every dish I have tried has been fantastic. It is very easy to follow the directions, and Anna always gives more information, and a little story with most of the dishes. These are not recipes taken from somewhere else and just put in a collection. If she does use a recipe from another source she always give credit. Other than that she developed these dishes by herself, and as a side note she did all the photography as well. Get this book, follow the recipes, eat the food and you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis T.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I've tried so far (about 12 different recipes) has been delicious and easy to make
customer_reviews.text: This quickly turned into my go to recipe book. Everything I've tried so far (about 12 different recipes) has been delicious and easy to make. If you are trying to eat healthy by cutting back on sugar and grains, this book is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress how much I LOVE this book! Wish I could rate it 10 stars! I have tried at least 15 of the recipes and they have all been successful and tasty. These recipes are easy to follow, and, at least the ones I've tried, are quick to make. My favorite is the easy cauliflower pizza crust! And the coconut shrimp! Oh, and the pistachio salmon! The ice cream made with ONLY berries and HWC is so easy and delicious and will make you wonder why anybody adds sugar to something already SO sweet! Seriously, get this book, try the recipes! I cannot wait for the second book! 😋 I'm including pics of a few recipes I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Anna's work has paid off in this beautiful book
customer_reviews.text: Anna has spent much time giving careful attention to ingredient, process, and photographic detail. Her care is evident in the final product. If you're already a fan of Anna, you'll be thrilled to have her in the kitchen with you through this book. If you do not know Anna's work yet, you are about to have a new favorite person to follow, learn from, and respect. I look forward to hours of cooking from this book while listening to Anna and Vinnie on the podcast. When the hard copy is available, I'm sending it to me 8 closest friends straight away.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: I have made about 15 recipes from Eat Happy and other things Anna has put out and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have made about 15 recipes from Eat Happy and other things Anna has put out and we have not had 1 thing that was bad or even mediocre! We're batting 1.000! Most of the recipes are super easy and the other ones are moderately easy. Even if you are a beginner cook this is the book for you. Also Anna is very open on Twitter and if you have questions or comments she will respond and give you information. The only thing about this book that is missing is more recipes! Thank you Anna for putting out a great book!!!! It has made cooking fun! follow me at @primohistory for pictures of her great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to give this cookbook only 4 stars. I have a LOT of cookbooks, and I am pretty picky about buying new ones. Eat Happy has almost everything I want in a cookbook! Almost every recipe sounds delicious and I can’t wait to make them. Many of the recipes have pretty color photos. My main complaint is that there is no commentary at the beginning of the recipes. I love reading those introductory comments and really missed them here. Otherwise, this cookbook is definitely a keeper and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cookbook for followers of a gluten free
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cookbook for followers of a gluten free, low carb, etc. lifestyle. Heck, it's even a great cookbook if you don't follow any special diet. The recipes are great but most importantly to me they're very easy to make and all use common grocery store ingredients. Far too many times I've seen amazing recipes from cookbooks that have you scouring every local ethnic store and more to find obscure ingredients. With Eat Happy you'll be making great healthy meals without stressing out about it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DiCola

customer_reviews.title: Recipes that are delicious and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Eat Happy after jumping into my new way of eating: NSNG (No Sugar No Grains) and was completely excited and relieved to find familiar dishes! There's amazing recipes for pizza, beef, chicken, soups and DESSERTS. I usually never buy cookbooks because only a couple recipes would be worth my time, but Anna really pulled together an amazing group of food recipes. I'm really looking forward to her second book release. I'm very grateful for any help with new dishes accustomed to this lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Fngrmnky

customer_reviews.title: The best cookbook!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is hands down the best purchase I've ever made. It's hard to believe that these recipes are good for you because they taste delicious!!!! Even my husband LOVES everything I've made from here and he's a very tough food critic. The cauliflower tots are ridiculously yummy and the chicken with artichokes, spinach, and cherry tomatoes...let's just say I licked the pan clean! Definitely buy this book not just for the flavorful recipes, but for your health as well!! Anna rocks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, easy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookbook after listening to the podcast Fitness Confidential. I have been following a LCHF way of eating for over three months. This cookbook is perfect! Recipes are easy to follow and extremely tasty! I absolutely love the nut and seed granola, low carb pizza crust, pistachio crusted salmon, flax seed pancakes. Have probably made about half the recipes several times. Looking forward to the next cookbook and will be buying it as soon as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Gilb

customer_reviews.title: Eating Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I have followed Anna's NSNG blog for years. I love the cookbook!! Can't get enuf of the pizza crust pg 33. I have been NSNG for years and having pizza is such a treat again. Pan Fried Bone In Rib Eye Pg 47 is another fav along with pistachio crusted salmon on pg 35. I waited years for this cookbook and also ordered the kindle version to bring to the grocery store with me. minimum list of ingredients for max taste. I'm eating happy.
customer_reviews.author: pstrass

customer_reviews.title: My Dinner "Go-To"!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I really dread figuring out dinner ideas that are NSNG (no sugar, no grain) for me and still able to please the whole family and this book nails it for me. I make the Asian Marinated Shrimp every week and every week it gets cheers! The recipes are easy (especially for this non-cook) and delish. I've pre-ordered Eat Happy Too. Can't wait for it. Thanks Anna Vocino!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite cookbook ever
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is my favorite cookbook ever. I made Chicken Dijon tonight and it was excellent. It has lots of flavor for not that much work. Definitely one for company. I've also tried the Cauliflower Pizza Crust (the trick with cheesecloth is brilliant!), Pan Fried Bone-in Rib Eye (delicious) and Herb Roasted Lamb Chops. This was the 3rd recipe I've tried for the cauliflower pizza crust and Anna's is definitely the best. I've purchased a spiralizer and will try the zucchini noodles this week. Thanks Anna, for a wonderful cookbook and for getting me out of a really boring dinner menu rut.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: No grains is the key to fixing chronic joint pain
customer_reviews.text: An essential cookbook to help in eliminating grains and finally kicking the carb habit. The recipes are delicious, satisfying, and healthy! I've finally overcome chronic joint pain eating this way, and lost 101 lbs (and counting!) in the past year based on this way of eating. Buy a copy for yourself and then buy more for all your friends and family-- they'll be asking for your secrets! My favorite recipe is the kale salad, and I never thought kale would be my favorite anything! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eat Well...EAT HAPPY.  Favorite cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a must-have cookbook. The Chicken with Artichoke Hearts, Spinach, and Cherry Tomatoes (shown here) is life changing good, and works equally well for an easy week-night dinner, or served to guests on special occasions. We reach for this cookbook (and the companion, Eat Happy Too) weekly. The Shepherd’s Pie with Cauliflower Mash is a huge hit, particularly on cold winter nights. And the Asian Marinated Shrimp Skewers are on regular rotation at our house during grilling season. (And, please note: The recipes are so good, so varied, and so flavorful, you’ll have a hard time remembering that you bought a “healthy” cookbook. This is where eating well and eating healthfully meet. Happily.) #NSNG #grainfree #celiac
customer_reviews.author: MOBryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been gf for awhile now, I like this cookbook, it has things I would actually cook and not things that look good in pictures but I would never make. I've made several things from this and they've all been very good!
customer_reviews.author: Magpie126

customer_reviews.title: Anna took her time and didnt just rush into releasing a quickie book but rather releasing a cookbook with beautiful photos, wond
customer_reviews.text: I've been listenng to Vinnie and Anna since episode 1 throughout that time there was alk of a cookbook and people were anxiously awaiting it to come. Anna took her time and didnt just rush into releasing a quickie book but rather releasing a cookbook with beautiful photos, wonderful recipies that serve a purpose for all those looking for a healthier way of eating. Here's to hoping there will be a volume two someday.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Delicious recipes you will make again and again
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cookbook for about 18 months, and cook from it weekly. The recipes are fool-proof, delicious, and and the book itself is beautiful which makes it even more of a joy to cook from. A few of my favorite recipes are Dijon Chicken, Bacon Broccoli, Quesadilla Casserole, Lemony Chicken Thighs., and Asian Pork Loin. Unfortunately, very shortly after receiving the book I noticed an issue with the binding. I just dealt with it, and continued cooking the amazing recipes. The author recently noticed the issue in a photo I had posted and reached out for my address to send me a replacement book. Amazing recipes, genuine customer service....BUY THIS BOOK. You will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can finally EAT HAPPY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Anna Vocino! NSNG and after 4 months I feel so much better. Over 70lbs are gone but my love of food is not. I've tried 17 recopies so far and everything has been awesome. I love it. Buy this as an E-book and then get a hard copy too! Eating without guilt is a new experience for me. There was always some shame involved because I knew I was eating poorly. Not anymore. Thanks again Anna you made my life tasty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steelcomic

customer_reviews.title: Eat Happy, Be Happy
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good cook book where people can make REAL food without all the processed grains and sugar. Anna shows you how easy it is to cook the actual healthy way and not sacrifice your favorite flavors. With the variety and ease of the recipes that she provides, you have no excuse not to be cooking from this book every day. Start living your life by eating the way people are meant to eat and buy this book! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bacarella

customer_reviews.title: Eat happy AND healthy. The best $25 you'll ever spend on a cookbook
customer_reviews.text: There's no question that this is the best cookbook I've ever invested in. All those fad cookbooks with super-complicated and flavorless recipes became kindling when Eat Happy arrived at my doorstep. So far we've tried six or seven recipes and there was not a stinker in the bunch! A personal favorite is the Chicken with Artichokes, Spinach and Tomatoes - just to die for. The only regret you should ever have with food is not eating the right food, and this book will keep you on the straight-and-narrow. Of course, your only other regret may be not getting this book, but that's easily remedied. Click the order now button; I promise you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great book for getting your feet under you!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the kind of cook that follows a recipe. This book has inspired me to do my own thing with the building blocks Anna offers. It's truly a great resource if you get overwhelmed by the internet's offerings of this kind of cooking & meal planning. Simple, easy to understand, easy to adapt to your (or your family's) food likes & dislikes. Used in conjunction with advice from my doctor, Vinnie Tortorich's teachings and tons of internet research, I'm so happy I found this. I bought it twice in digital form.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: I really love this book
customer_reviews.text: From one celiac girl to another, I LOVE this book. The recipes are simple, and are truly easy to make. I really appreciate how the recipes are super tasty, all healthy and easy to modify if you are also dairy free. I tagged over half of the book for recipes I would like to make soon.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Momma

customer_reviews.title: The recipes are easy to make (unlike some cookbooks where they require a ...
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook ROCKS! Everything I have made from it so far is tasty and healthy. The recipes are easy to make (unlike some cookbooks where they require a culinary degree to make them). If you are on Instagram follow unfilteredfoodie to see the pictures of many of her recipes that I have made. Cannot wait until the next cookbook comes out, I will purchase that one too! We love you Anna, keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! Everything I have tried so far is great and there aren't a bunch of weird ingredients like some healthy cookbooks seem to have. Also it is just pretty. I know that shouldn't make a difference but I am more excited to try recipes when the pictures are good and the book has a pleasing layout. Give this cookbook a try, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Cook recipes, bad binding
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are great! Easy to follow and nice pictures too. My only major complaint is the binding for the hardcover edition is completely falling apart. All the pages are falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V.

customer_reviews.title: Food was amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookbook. I bought this because I'm a fan of the podcast, but after trying two different recipes this weekend I know I'll be using this book for a long time. The food was GREAT! My husband, who is a very picky eater, loved both meals! And I love the fact that there was no added sugar or grains in either meal. I would definitely recommend this cookbook to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and witty storytelling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for my sister, who was recently diagnosed with Celiac, and she is having a difficult time finding foods and recipes she likes and will maintain her health. The recipes are great, but even more, Anna's whimsical writing in between the recipes is so much fun. I ordered a copy of the book for myself too, as even though not suffering from food allergies, eating clean and process-free is the overall best way to a healthful and pain free life!! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: SCUBAgirl

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best, healthy cookbook I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best, healthy cookbook I've ever bought! I've made at least one recipe each day for more than 2 weeks and each has been delicious, flavorful and a big hit with all 7 of the people in my family! This cookbook is a must for anyone who is working toward a healthier lifestyle! Thank you Anna for sharing your amazing food with all of us! Can't wait for the sequel! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipe book for beginners of the NSNG Low Carb High Fat way of eating.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with people from the midwest. My meals were the basic meat and potatoes. I was diagnosed as a Type 2 diabetic in 2010, and my disease was getting worse, so I knew I needed to change my diet. Anna's book was the answer to my prayers. It is easy to follow, lots of my favorite recipes modified to eliminate grains and sugar (NSNG) and still have lots of flavor. I made the Green Bean Casserole for Thanksgiving, and I make the ice cream all the time. I highly recommend this book for people wanting to make healthier meals for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: goforhi

customer_reviews.title: New Go-to Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Never ask yourself again, "What can I make for dinner?" These easy to follow, healthful recipes will never fail to please your taste buds and all follow No Sugar, No Grains - Yay! I was NOT given a free copy of this book to review. I paid my own money to order the Kindle copy and am looking forward to receiving the hardback copies. One for me and one to give away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Low

customer_reviews.title: Tasty recipes the NSNG way
customer_reviews.text: There are some things that bother me about the book: no index for example. And of course I like pictures with every recipe which this one (as many other cookbooks) doesn't have. But the recipes are fairly simple to make and so far all the ones I've tried are VERY tasty. Trying to adhere to the NSNG (no sugar, no grain) lifestyle can be a challenge, but Anna's book makes it much easier. She's also very responsive answering questions on FB on Vinnie Tortorich's no sugar no grain. I'd buy it again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: PKJazz

customer_reviews.title: 5 star food, but without listing grams of carb a 4 star review.
customer_reviews.text: Like that the book has pictures of food. Tried the slow cooked brisket which was perfect. As a diabetic and super sensitive to carbs I knocked off one star as a recipes do not list carbs/sugars.
customer_reviews.author: thewon

customer_reviews.title: Low carb, full flavor
customer_reviews.text: So many great ideas in here! Typically cook books have one or two good recipes and the rest are ok or call for a ton of ingredients. This book has so many great recipes in each category that impress my non-NSNG friends and family. She even includes a section in the front of standard items to stock in your pantry and fridge. Thank you Anna Vocino for making this way of eating so easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. Recipes are easy to follow and delicious. My favorite so far is the quesadilla casserole. I ordered the kindle version and pre-ordered the hard cover. I can't wait to receive the hardcover. Receives the hardcover and love it even more. I'm ordering one for my mom for her birthday and for my sister for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Carjack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic book
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is fantastic. I was amazed how great the cauliflower pizza crust was, and the recipe for beef seasoned with truffle salt is my new go to for steak seasoning. Now I'm looking forward to trying the zucchini mac and cheese next. This book is great!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes that will help with weight loss
customer_reviews.text: wonderful recipes, but it is also about the lifestyle of less sugar and less grains - understanding that we are not meant to eat that - with that in mind the author has compiled regular delicious recipes that will not leave you wanting more like conventional diets - looking forward to a follow up!
customer_reviews.author: Tennison Long

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This book as well as Eat Happy Too are by far the best cook books I've ever owned! The dishes are quick, easy, and uncomplicated!!! I literally plan my entire weekly menu for my family with Anna's Recipes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for low carb, low sugar diets
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on a very restricted low sugar, low carb diet and was struggling with finding new things to eat. I also have a lot of food allergies which made it even more difficult. I was able to eat almost everything in this book, or at least make simple substitutions. I'm also not much of a cook but these recipes were easy to follow, and even gave me ideas for new ones. I will absolutely be ordering the next book when it comes out.
customer_reviews.author: NorthwestGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great resource to cook delicious, grain-free food!
customer_reviews.text: I love Eat Happy so much that I purchased both the Kindle and hardcover versions. I've made several dishes so far and I plan to try every recipe in the book. The 'fried' chicken legs, low-carb pizza and pork chili verde are some of my favorites. The recipes are easy to follow and the ones I've tried have turned out great. I have several cookbooks but this is now my go-to book for healthy, low-carb dishes. The quality of the hardcover version is also really nice. This would make an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: F WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Recomend
customer_reviews.text: I do not cook very well, and the instructions are easy for me to follow. It has been useful for grocery shopping, and helping me to prepare meals.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Stradlin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and informative
customer_reviews.text: Anna has done a wonderful job giving us very tasty meals that are no sugar no grains. I've Been waiting on this cookbook for months and I can say is better than I thought. Can't wait to get to cooking. THANK YOU ANNA!! Great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book for easy, healthy recipes, and you will BE HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: These recipes are pretty easy to make and so good! I love it that the author doesn't use any "fad" ingredients so it's easy to shop. Buy this book just for "Chicken with Artichokes, Spinach, and Cherry Tomatoes!" You will be licking your plate clean! "Simple Beef & Portobello Stew" was great too! The Pizza is AMAZING for gluten-free and it's very filling. There are lots of great breakfast options, and smoothies and drinks too. Real recipes for real people! Good clean whole foods! It's pretty clear that these recipes were tested several times to get them perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 copies
customer_reviews.text: We have a grandchild with celiac. I read reviews for a bunch of cookbooks and this seemed to be the best. I ordered 2 copies; one for us and one for her mom. The recipes look simple enough and as a grampa that likes to cook, I find that appealing.
customer_reviews.author: lennard

customer_reviews.title: A wealth of NSNG information.
customer_reviews.text: Anna's meals are very well thought out. I have already lost 15 pounds. She also provides some suggestions and useful guidelines in the beginning of the book that is very helpful. Please don't skip straight to the meals and read the useful guidelines and tips first, you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Mir Katz

customer_reviews.title: Been disappointed by cookbooks in the past
customer_reviews.text: Listened to Anna on Dr Drew and Adam podcast. Been disappointed by cookbooks in the past, but this has restored my faith. Easy recipes, no crazy (hard to find) ingredients. I highly recommend the basil Dijon Salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Patterson-Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love the "getting started" sections, like the pantry essentials
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have tried has been great so far. My husband is so in love with the chili lime flat iron steak that I'm a little worried he's going to divorce me and marry the steak...except that he needs me to cook it for him. I especially love the section listing pantry and refrigerator essentials. I think that is really helpful for someone who may be just starting this new way of eating and doesn't really know where to start, or someone like me who is terrible at meal planning and grocery shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tefertiller

customer_reviews.title: Get this book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookbook! The recipes are delicious and simple to make, and there are even pictures for people like me who like to see what the finished product should look like. I highly recommend this book for anyone who is eating a low carb, no grain and gluten free diet.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's price for one recipe!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this book! I made the shepard pie yesterday and it's the best I have ever tasted. I have tried to make mashed "potatoes" with cauliflower before but it never tasted right. Better than real potatoes, so light and delicate. Haven't tried anything else yet but I would have paid $10 for this recipe alone. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Eating Happy is so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Eating Happy is so much fun! Anna Vocino thank you so much for all you have done creating such a great cookbook and continued recipes! Everything I have made from your cookbook has been great. Every gathering or party I have a dish or two from your book and people are always requesting the recipes. I love the section on Pantry and Fridge Essentials! I have been motivated to create my own dishes based on your recipes and suggestions, these inspirations come from your original work and you can't thank you enough Eat Happy is by far my favorite cookbook and in my Top 10 list of books period! Can't wait for the next one! Thanks for everything
customer_reviews.author: michael s blocher

customer_reviews.title: Recipes I'd actually make!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased that this recipe book has a collection of good-for-you meals that can easy translate into everyday cooking for a family. Some cookbooks leave me wondering, "Yeah, but how often would you use this recipe?" or "Like my kids or picky spouse would even eat that!" Not this one. I trust these recipes. A person could easily plan out their whole weekly menu plan using this one cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I'm new to low carbs and this book has easy recipes. Skip the bread though -- made it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to low carbs and this book has easy recipes. Skip the bread though -- made it twice and both times it came out a tasteless brick.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Aptly and accurately titled
customer_reviews.text: Have tried some of the recipes and every one of them has made me want to try another! Made the Rosemary Sweet Potato Hash tonight and, for someone whose only previous experience with sweet potatoes was that hideous dish with the melted marshmallows, it was a revelation. So delicious! Fathead pizza is another big favorite at our house. If you're like me and not a gourmet, but have the basics down, this is a great place to find recipes that will make you feel good and impress those you feed - including yourself! Thanks, Anna! We're feeling the love!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wright

customer_reviews.title: A great cookbook on so many levels
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook and at times I get in a routine of making the same go-to meals but this book makes it so easy and affordable to get out of that funk and let me cook delicious meals that don't take a lot of time. Anna's recipes are super creative and make cooking fun. I also like how navy of her recipes are easy to change up the ingredients and still be yummy and healthy. Can't wait to get the hard copy that I've ready pre-ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blazer

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cook book it is a easy read easy to follow instructions ,I can feel all the passion Anna Vocino has put in this book ,So far I have only made one recipe and it turned out perfect, It has made me look forward to cooking and being creative in the kitchen again ,I will not only eat happy I will cook happy too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to cut carbs
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cookbook. I wanted to cut out sugars and carbs from my diet but I had such few recipe ideas to work with going into the change. This cookbook was a lifesaver! Every recipe we have tried has been fantastic and really helped us learn how to make delicious and filling recipes that cut out carbs and sugar without sacrificing flavor. Sincerely my wife and I reference this book at least 4 dinners per week and have been doing so for over 6 months. We will continue to do so and can’t wait to start using the next book when it comes out later this year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously buy this cook book...you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how to go about low carb grain free. I happened across this cook book and read the reviews. I was sold. I have made many of the recipes. The reviews are not wrong. The granola, the pancakes, the beef stew, but tonight was the best yet the Dijon chicken OMG. The Best! This book has taken my journey from unsure to winning. If you are on the fence for any reason just buy it you won't regret it. Seriously I would give it 10 🌟!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Eat Happy: Gluten Free, Grain Free, Low Carb Recipes Made from Real Foods For A Joyful Life
